00049 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00050 |   AP4_AvccAtom
00051 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00052 class AP4_AvccAtom : public AP4_Atom
00053 {
00054 public:
00055     // class methods
00056     static AP4_AvccAtom* Create(AP4_Size size, AP4_ByteStream& stream) {
00057         return new AP4_AvccAtom(size, stream);
00058     }
00059     static const char* GetProfileName(AP4_UI08 profile);
00060 
00061     // methods
00062     AP4_AvccAtom(AP4_UI08 config_version,
00063                  AP4_UI08 profile,
00064                  AP4_UI08 level,
00065                  AP4_UI08 profile_compatibility,
00066                  AP4_UI08 length_size,
00067                  AP4_Array<AP4_DataBuffer> sequence_parameters,
00068                  AP4_Array<AP4_DataBuffer> picture_parameters);
00069     virtual AP4_Result InspectFields(AP4_AtomInspector& inspector);
00070     virtual AP4_Result WriteFields(AP4_ByteStream& stream);
00071 
00072     // accessors
00073     AP4_UI08 GetConfigurationVersion() const { return m_ConfigurationVersion; }
00074     AP4_UI08 GetProfile() const              { return m_Profile; }
00075     AP4_UI08 GetLevel() const                { return m_Level; }
00076     AP4_UI08 GetProfileCompatibility() const { return m_ProfileCompatibility; }
00077     AP4_UI08 GetNaluLengthSize() const       { return m_NaluLengthSize; }
00078     AP4_Array<AP4_DataBuffer>& GetSequenceParameters() { return m_SequenceParameters; }
00079     AP4_Array<AP4_DataBuffer>& GetPictureParameters()  { return m_PictureParameters; }
00080     const AP4_DataBuffer& GetRawBytes() const { return m_RawBytes; }
00081 
00082 private:
00083     // methods
00084     AP4_AvccAtom(AP4_UI32 size, AP4_ByteStream& stream);
00085 
00086     // members
